short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a pane to the tenhou.net and ron2.jp clients (/3, /4) in-game which contains the score history of the hands in the current game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This adds a scoring pane to the right-hand side of the Ron2 and tenhou mahjong html5 clients, which lists the results of each hand.

Support is available on the Mahjong Discord - I'm ApplySci, just ping me there.

Great for streamers. Great for anyone who wants to follow how their game is progressing.

v3 works with Ron2.jp/3 , as well as the tenhou clients at tenhou.net/3 and tenhou.net/4
